title: [Medicine] Novo Nordisk study finds that semaglutide (Wegovy) reduces risk of serious cardiovascular events such as heart attacks by 20% in overweight patients with a history of cardiovascular disease and no history of diabetes

[Health] Study on 20 participants with an avg of 17.9 years found that those who were stronger, faster and more agile, in other words, had better neuromuscular fitness since childhood, had larger Crus I grey matter volume in adolescence
